attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: THIS APP IS CURSED AND OFFENSIVE. When I opened the app the image was TERRIFYING and I couldn’t believe my eyes. And then the orange man on the screen started screaming profanities at me and then, after wounding my pride, he then asked me to endorse him for president. the AUDACITY of this man to ask this, how can i trust someone who spray tans himself to be a cheeto? i can’t. this app is not ok i will be deleting it from my phone.

attributes.title: Why haven’t y’all fixed this app?!
attributes.review: This is the president we’re talking about! Why is the app soo ugly?! Photoshop exists for a reason! Edit the orange and double chin out of Trump and you’ll get a decent looking president. It’s not that hard! I hope you make this change otherwise I will be uninstalling the app.

attributes.title: It gave me a disease 🤢
attributes.review: From the moment I downloaded the app, my hair has strangely begun to turn blond and fall 🥵. As well as my skin becoming Cheeto colored 🟠and I now have the urge to dislike China . I have contacted my doctor who sadly said it is an incurable disease by the name of Trumpnides 🤮. I do not suggest this app to anyone, caused me thousands of dollars to get rid of the color. 😭

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER 😤
attributes.review: Hello. DO NOT get this app. I almost died because of it! When I first opened the app I saw the most horrifying thing I have ever seen in my 69 years of life. I saw a disgusting Cheeto puff looking creature on my phone screen. From there I had a heart attack😖. My sister had to rush me to the ER! Thankfully I survived but I will never be the same😔. Don’t get the app.😔🙄😡

This app is so terrible, there aren’t words fit to express it. You have no idea how many times I tried to get the app to close and it wouldn’t ! It would glitch and go to a blank screen and it’s so frustrating ! I have no idea why anyone would ever want to use this app 🤮🤮

when i opened the app, i got a notification from someone name DJ Trumpet and he told me he wanted to plan my birthday party? Which was weird because my birthday wasn’t for 6 more months. anyways when he got here for my party he started playing Deepthroat by Cupkakke. My grandma heard the music and instantly died from a heart attack. DONT DOWNLOAD THE APP, HE WILL KILL YOUR GRANDMA.

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: When I first got this app it blacked out my whole phone. Then shortly after I got my phone back up and running.I went back on the app because well I love trump duh. This app overheated my phone then gave it a virus just from being on it. If there was a 0/5 that’s what I would give it.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP REMOVE IT NOW
attributes.review: First of all, the cover of this app is COMPLETELY unappealing. A little cheeto bunker boy?! Really?! Totally inappropriate. Second of all, when i opened the app, i was bombarded with questions, asking for my personal information like bruh, you think i would give my email away to this 70 year old fascist, racist, homophobic, transphobic, white man? NEXT CALLERRR💞

attributes.title: R.I.P Goldy
attributes.review: I downloaded the app😖 because I “support” 𝑡ℎ𝑒 𝑝𝑟𝑒𝑠𝑖𝑑𝑒𝑛𝑡. But apparently 🤢the bunker boy🤮 doesn't like gold fish 🐠 because he 😱 sent his evil army of microwaves 💡💎🔨⏳💳⌛️ to  my house and cooked my Goldy😭😫😩😩😢😥😥😓😓. That 🍊orange deserves to be peeled and stuffed in a peach🍑. His microwaves from heck burned my 🐟 to death💀. Shhhhh don’t tell my mom I cursed. Chicken🐓 wing 🍗 chicken 🐓 wing 🍗 hotdog 🌭 and baloney ✨ 🐔 and macaroni  🍝 chillin 🥶with my 😘 homies 👯‍♀️.

attributes.title: sit on ur throne 💗✨🌸 but make it electric💗🧚‍♂️✨
attributes.review: After I opened the app it proceeded to delete all my information and a big orange Cheeto appeared on my screen. 10/10 would not recommend. My poor brother is now In therapy getting treatment for those nightmares he get of 🍊chasing him through the White House halls telling him to inject him self bleach.
